DS.content: writing in white, Derrida has written quotes w/ chalk on blackboard [Mallarmé’s page-phantom]
DS.linkedContent: writing in white, Derrida has written quotes w/ chalk on blackboard [Mallarmé’s page-phantom]

DS.content: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron
DS.linkedContent: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron

DS.content: suspended lustre of title: title provides a first fold, highlights womb-like matrix of page, a germinal or seminal blank, “the perpetual suspense of a tear that can never be entirely formed nor fall (still the lustre) scintillates in a thousand glances”
DS.linkedContent: suspended lustre of title: title provides a first fold, highlights womb-like matrix of page, a germinal or seminal blank, “the perpetual suspense of a tear that can never be entirely formed nor fall (still the lustre) scintillates in a thousand glances”

DS.content: the 2 faces of double session: 1) mime inaugurates: breaks into white page 2) “candid virginity” of white page
DS.linkedContent: the 2 faces of double session: 1) mime inaugurates: breaks into white page 2) “candid virginity” of white page

DS.content: mime: writes himself on white page he is
DS.linkedContent: mime: writes himself on white page he is

DS.content: mime mimes a kind of writing, is himself written in a kind of writing, nothing of what is can lie beyond medium/speculum reading-writing > there is 1) writing w/out book, marking tip (la pointe du trait) proceeds w/out past upon virgin sheet 2) infinite number of booklets in other booklets > Mallarmé reads, writes while reading, while reading text written by Mime, who himself reads in order to write
DS.linkedContent: mime mimes a kind of writing, is himself written in a kind of writing, nothing of what is can lie beyond medium/speculum reading-writing > there is 1) writing w/out book, marking tip (la pointe du trait) proceeds w/out past upon virgin sheet 2) infinite number of booklets in other booklets > Mallarmé reads, writes while reading, while reading text written by Mime, who himself reads in order to write

DS.content: Richard: more perfect phantom, the mime, white as unwritten page [Philebus]
DS.linkedContent: Richard: more perfect phantom, the mime, white as unwritten page [Philebus]

DS.content: blank as polysemic totality of whiteness plus the fanlike form of text (spaced-out splitting of whole), plus the writing site (hymen), no longer determinate signifier or signifier at all
DS.linkedContent: blank as polysemic totality of whiteness plus the fanlike form of text (spaced-out splitting of whole), plus the writing site (hymen), no longer determinate signifier or signifier at all

DS.content: “blank” marks everything white (snow, virginity, frigidity, sails, swan’s wings, foam) plus the blankness that allows for the mark in the first place
DS.linkedContent: “blank” marks everything white (snow, virginity, frigidity, sails, swan’s wings, foam) plus the blankness that allows for the mark in the first place

DS.content: paper & hymen: blankness that allows for fold > forever re-marks itself as disappearance, erasure, non-sense
DS.linkedContent: paper & hymen: blankness that allows for fold > forever re-marks itself as disappearance, erasure, non-sense

DS.content: polysemia is infinite not because a finite reading/writing can’t exhaust super abundant meaning, no, displace finitude acc. law/structure of text: blank, like hymen, forever erasing itself > finitude becomes infinitude in suspension of equation btwn mark & meaning (non-Hegelian finitude/infinitude)
DS.linkedContent: polysemia is infinite not because a finite reading/writing can’t exhaust super abundant meaning, no, displace finitude acc. law/structure of text: blank, like hymen, forever erasing itself > finitude becomes infinitude in suspension of equation btwn mark & meaning (non-Hegelian finitude/infinitude)

DS.content: linkages & rifts created by fold & blank, propagated in text, make it so that nothing can simply have the value of a theme > one can always subtract a blank from the series, ou l’ajouter en surnombre au nombre [add it as an extra to the #], even if the # is infinite
DS.linkedContent: linkages & rifts created by fold & blank, propagated in text, make it so that nothing can simply have the value of a theme > one can always subtract a blank from the series, ou l’ajouter en surnombre au nombre [add it as an extra to the #], even if the # is infinite

DS.content: supplementary “blank,” in marking itself, intervenes btwn all series, prevents semantic seriality from closing itself, c’est encore lui qui libère des effets de série > makes us take agglomerates for substances
DS.linkedContent: supplementary “blank,” in marking itself, intervenes btwn all series, prevents semantic seriality from closing itself, c’est encore lui qui libère des effets de série > makes us take agglomerates for substances

DS.content: virginity (newness, wholeness) always overlaid w/ opposite—virginity submits to operation of hymen of its own accord
DS.linkedContent: virginity (newness, wholeness) always overlaid w/ opposite—virginity submits to operation of hymen of its own accord

DS.content: each “full” white thing in Mallarmé (snow, swan, paper, virginity) is trope of “empty” white space, constellation of “blanks,” there everywhere, reproduced in spacings > la disséminaton des blancs (nous ne dirons pas de la blancheur)
DS.linkedContent: each “full” white thing in Mallarmé (snow, swan, paper, virginity) is trope of “empty” white space, constellation of “blanks,” there everywhere, reproduced in spacings > la disséminaton des blancs (nous ne dirons pas de la blancheur)

DS.content: no total/proper meaning because blank folds over (se plie), dès que le blanc (est) blanc, (se) blanchit, as soon as there’s a mark, there’s a re-mark, no blank w/ capital B, no theology of Text, yet desire for reappropriation, structural site of theological trap, is produced, nourished, in very act of separating from it
DS.linkedContent: no total/proper meaning because blank folds over (se plie), dès que le blanc (est) blanc, (se) blanchit, as soon as there’s a mark, there’s a re-mark, no blank w/ capital B, no theology of Text, yet desire for reappropriation, structural site of theological trap, is produced, nourished, in very act of separating from it

DS.content: mark (same word as margin or marche): word and blank between words > marked twice
DS.linkedContent: mark (same word as margin or marche): word and blank between words > marked twice

DS.content: blank, counting on and discounting itself at once > blank figures: page, infinite background, behind
DS.linkedContent: blank, counting on and discounting itself at once > blank figures: page, infinite background, behind

DS.content: hymen is not a phenomenon—it folds itself back into the antre, which is an abyss
DS.linkedContent: hymen is not a phenomenon—it folds itself back into the antre, which is an abyss

DS.content: mark upon mark, text w/in text, margin in mark (endless repeat): an abyss
DS.linkedContent: mark upon mark, text w/in text, margin in mark (endless repeat): an abyss

DS.content: writing en abyme, abyss will never have glint (l’éclat) of phenomenon > becomes white or black, l’un et/ou l’autre au carré de l’écriture
DS.linkedContent: writing en abyme, abyss will never have glint (l’éclat) of phenomenon > becomes white or black, l’un et/ou l’autre au carré de l’écriture

DS.content: désertant toute profondeur, chacune de ses faces est aussi, après coup, tout le dé ——in a hymen depending on verse, blank once more, composed of chance & necessity, writing prepares to receive the seminal spurt of a throw of dice
DS.linkedContent: désertant toute profondeur, chacune de ses faces est aussi, après coup, tout le dé ——in a hymen depending on verse, blank once more, composed of chance & necessity, writing prepares to receive the seminal spurt of a throw of dice

P.content: but en blanc [cf. C p. 229 can(n)on] (gun as finality w/out end in sight) [goal as white page] Kant’s finality w/out end: free beauty, wild tulip
P.linkedContent: but en blanc [cf. C p. 229 can(n)on] (gun as finality w/out end in sight) [goal as white page] Kant’s finality w/out end: free beauty, wild tulip

POS.content: displacement forms a system, undecidable resource sets system in motion: necessity of “blank spaces”
POS.linkedContent: displacement forms a system, undecidable resource sets system in motion: necessity of “blank spaces”

POS.content: gram, reserve, incision, trace, spacing, blank, supplement, margin, pharmakon—a list w/ no taxonomical closure, not a lexicon: not atoms but focal points (foyers), crucibles of economic condensation, sites of passage: spread out through text, each in a different way
POS.linkedContent: gram, reserve, incision, trace, spacing, blank, supplement, margin, pharmakon—a list w/ no taxonomical closure, not a lexicon: not atoms but focal points (foyers), crucibles of economic condensation, sites of passage: spread out through text, each in a different way

O.content: protocol of preface destroys future anterior > a gluing (kollon), praefatio, prae-fari, protokollon as formula, pharmacopoeia, begins (law of dissemination) doubled by a “facing,” divides/undoes inaugural pretention of first page: neither depth, nor surface, in or for itself, un bloc magique
O.linkedContent: protocol of preface destroys future anterior > a gluing (kollon), praefatio, prae-fari, protokollon as formula, pharmacopoeia, begins (law of dissemination) doubled by a “facing,” divides/undoes inaugural pretention of first page: neither depth, nor surface, in or for itself, un bloc magique

O.content: Kierkegaard: blank spaces, voids btwn books, empty expanse btwn Teutons > write what you will
O.linkedContent: Kierkegaard: blank spaces, voids btwn books, empty expanse btwn Teutons > write what you will

CHM.content: if language is the break w/ madness, the closer and closer language gets to it, it’ll be separated only by “transparent sheet” (of which Joyce speaks) > this diaphaneity: “language, meaning, possibility, and elementary discretion of a nothing that neutralizes everything”
CHM.linkedContent: if language is the break w/ madness, the closer and closer language gets to it, it’ll be separated only by “transparent sheet” (of which Joyce speaks) > this diaphaneity: “language, meaning, possibility, and elementary discretion of a nothing that neutralizes everything”

CHM.content: thus, Foucault’s book a gesture of protection & internment
CHM.linkedContent: thus, Foucault’s book a gesture of protection & internment

EJQB.content: Jabès: at noon, facing infinity, the white page
EJQB.linkedContent: Jabès: at noon, facing infinity, the white page

D.content: pure present: la plénitude inentamée, la continuité vierge de la non-coupure (not yet having been written, à la veille du jeu)
D.linkedContent: pure present: la plénitude inentamée, la continuité vierge de la non-coupure (not yet having been written, à la veille du jeu)

D.content: atheism in Kabbalah, belief only in # [?] > Numbers a cabal/cabala where blanks only provisionally filled in
D.linkedContent: atheism in Kabbalah, belief only in # [?] > Numbers a cabal/cabala where blanks only provisionally filled in

D.content: whiteness of virgin paper, blankness of transparent column, air > more than neutrality of some medium, uncovers space of play, play of space
D.linkedContent: whiteness of virgin paper, blankness of transparent column, air > more than neutrality of some medium, uncovers space of play, play of space

CIN.content: entrust words to a page: better to inflame you, eat yourself up immediately, not a tomb that offers patience of mourning, but a tomb of a tomb, deprived of patience of mourning
CIN.linkedContent: entrust words to a page: better to inflame you, eat yourself up immediately, not a tomb that offers patience of mourning, but a tomb of a tomb, deprived of patience of mourning

OG.content: passivity of speech can’t be distinguished from relation btwn unconsciousness of language and spacing (pause, blank, punctuation, interval) that constitutes origin of signification in general
OG.linkedContent: passivity of speech can’t be distinguished from relation btwn unconsciousness of language and spacing (pause, blank, punctuation, interval) that constitutes origin of signification in general

OG.content: becoming-space of time & becoming-time of space mark dead time w/in presence of living present > dead time is at work, les blancs take on importance > limit of phenomenology
OG.linkedContent: becoming-space of time & becoming-time of space mark dead time w/in presence of living present > dead time is at work, les blancs take on importance > limit of phenomenology
